mapper.sql: id, frame_process_id, cfg_process_step_id, operate_person, operate_time, photos_url, photos_name, files_url, files_name, operate_result, time_used, flag_timeout
mapper.insert:
insert into wp_process_operate_log
id,
frame_process_id,
cfg_process_step_id,
operate_person,
operate_time,
photos_url,
photos_name,
files_url,
files_name,
operate_result,
time_used,
flag_timeout,
description,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{frameProcessId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cfgProcessStepId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{photosUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{photosName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{filesUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update wp_process_operate_log
frame_process_id = #{frameProcessId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cfg_process_step_id = #{cfgProcessStepId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_person = #{operatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
photos_url = #{photosUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photos_name = #{photosName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
files_url = #{filesUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
files_name = #{filesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_result = #{operateResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_used = #{timeUsed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag_timeout = #{flagTimeout,jdbcType=BIT},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
,
FROM wp_process_operate_log wpol WHERE wpol.cfg_process_step_id = #{cfgProcessStepId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND wpol.frame_process_id = #{frameProcessId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY wpol.operate_time DESC LIMIT 1
